name: Kobold's Revenge Demo
description:
Kobold's Revenge is a game about you, a Kobold, who's had enough of humans invading your tribe's forest and surrounding lands. Time to take some revenge and drive them out with your newly acquired cannon. Blow up buildings, walls, towers, crates, carts and all of the humans in an area to reclaim the land.

This is a free demo of 5 fully playable levels with 3 difficulties.
